alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Boyd; Brown; Custer; Garfield; Holt; Keya Paha; Loup; Rock; Thomas; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 10 at 2:52AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected with total accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible, as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Thursday to 6 AM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight Thursday night to noon CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility from snow. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Boyd; Brown; Custer; Garfield; Holt; Keya Paha; Loup; Rock; Thomas; Wheeler
